QuestData.Title: An Improvised Arsenal
QuestData.Description:
I don't know much about blacksmithing, but I'm pretty sure this won't be enough silver to outfit all of the Inquisitors. We will need to find another way to use this.
Let us hope that Ballaster can come up with something... creative.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Angus Ballaster to create a silver weapon at Watchman's Rise.
QuestData.CompletionText: What can ol' Angus do fer ye?
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah, she's a beaut'! Back in the navy we used te stuff our muskets with scraps when we ran outta bullets.
This'll do the damage ye need, te be sure!
